SourceProxy.name: TriSurfaceCutter
SourceProxy.label: Triangulation Cutter

Documentation.long_help: Cut a triangulated surface with one or more polygons.

SourceProxy.Documentation:
This filter is geometrically based, unlike vtkClipDataSet and vtkClipPolyData.
It crops an input vtkPolyData consisting of triangles with loops specified by a second input containing polygons.
The loop polygons can be concave, can have vertices exactly coincident with a mesh point/edge.
It computes an **embedding** of the loop polygons' edges upon the mesh followed by **removal** of triangles *in(out)side the polygons. See SetInsideOut().
It is possible to output a pure embedding or a pure removal.
Note: PointData is interpolated to output. CellData is copied over to both constraint lines, new triangles

InputProperty.name: InputMesh
InputProperty.Documentation:
Set input mesh polydata. It should ideally have only cells of type VTK_TRIANGLE.
Note: Before you use this filter, if 1. input is not a pure triangulation, pre-process w/ TriangleFilter/Delaunay2D. 2. input has cells of type VTK_TRIANGLE_STRIP, pre-process w/ Stripper.

InputProperty.name: LoopPolygons
InputProperty.Documentation:
Set the polydata that contains loop polygons.
Warning: z-coordinates of the points are assumed to lie at z=constant. In other words, this filter assumes that the data lies in a plane orthogonal to the z axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: AccelerateCellLocator
IntVectorProperty.label: Accelerate Cell Queries
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Check this box to accelerate cell queries with a multi-threaded cell locator. Default is On.

IntVectorProperty.name: Embed
IntVectorProperty.label: Embed
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Check this box to **embed** loop polygons onto the mesh. Default is On. Note: If **Remove** is disabled, the very functionality of this filter is disrespected.

IntVectorProperty.name: Remove
IntVectorProperty.label: Remove
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Check this box to only **remove** cells in(out)side loop polygons. Default is On. Note: If **Remove** is disabled, the functionality of this filter is partially disrespected.

IntVectorProperty.name: ColorAcquiredPts
IntVectorProperty.label: Color Acquired Points
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Check this box to color acquired(from loop polygons) points. Default is On.

IntVectorProperty.name: ColorLoopEdges
IntVectorProperty.label: Color Loop Edge
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Check this box to color constrained line segments (from loop polygons). Default is On.

IntVectorProperty.name: InsideOut
IntVectorProperty.label: Invert
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Check this box to remove cells outside loop polygons. Default is On.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Tolerance
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set numeric tolerance to aid unique point insertion and intersection math.

ProxyProperty.label: Point Merge Method
ProxyProperty.name: PointLocator
ProxyProperty.Documentation: This property specifies an incremental point locator for merging duplicate / coincident points.
